scheme_name: Financial Assistance for Setting Up of Sales Emporia by Industrial Associations, Handicrafts Societies and Recognized Institutions
description: This scheme in Puducherry provides financial assistance to industrial associations, handicraft societies, and recognized institutions for setting up sales emporia to promote handicraft and MSME products. It aims to enhance market access and visibility for artisans and small businesses.
key_features: Financial aid for establishing sales emporia
Support for handicraft and MSME product promotion

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 10 Lakhs for setting up sales emporia
benefits.one_time_assistance: Assistance provided one time per emporium

organization_criteria: Registered industrial associations, handicraft societies, or recognized institutions in Puducherry
Must have experience in promoting handicrafts or MSMEs
operational_criteria: Emporium must exclusively promote handicraft or MSME products
Must be located in a commercially viable location

eligible_activities: Setting up sales emporia for handicraft and MSME products

steps: Obtain the application form from the Department of Industries and Commerce, Puducherry
Submit a detailed proposal for the sales emporium
Attach required documents, including organization registration and location details
Applications are reviewed by the Industries Department
Approved applicants receive funding upon verification
application_process.note: Applicants must submit progress reports for fund utilization

special_notes: Funding is limited to one emporium per organization
Emporia must operate for at least 3 years to retain funding
Priority is given to emporia promoting local artisans
